long_description: Giro Code Bike Shoes are ideal for riders who want maximum power transfer plus the comfort and durability needed to withstand rugged trails and conditions. Light yet tough Teijin(R) microfiber uppers shape to your foot; welded midfoot scuff guards boost durabiltiy. Easton(R) EC90 unidirectional carbon fiber outsoles provide pro-level stiffness for efficient power transfer. Giro Code Bike Shoes offer adjustable arch support with the SuperNatural Fit Kit; includes low, medium and high arch supports you can easily swap out on the footbed. X-Static(R) antimicrobial footbed topsheet manages odor. Strong, secure ratcheting buckle closure is replaceable. Offset strap D-ring at midfoot; rubber nose guard. Accommodates steel toe spikes (included).
short_description: Giro Code Bike Shoes are ideal for riders who want maximum power transfer plus the comfort and durability needed to withstand rugged trails and conditions.
